data.name: Land Of Foot
data.detailed_description:
WELCOME TO THE LAND OF FOOT


Here the shoes are in control, and humans are nothing but tools.

Waking up, you are struck by the terrible news that your sole mate is missing!
Pretty soon, you come to notice that you are far from alone since everybody in the Land Of Foot is suddenly missing their partner.
This is the start of a crazy journey leading you on a mission to figure out what has happened and fix it.

Gather your friends and join the adventure, work together and fight your way through evil boots and bosses.
Use your lace to solve puzzles and win battles; a skilled player will soon learn how to do more than bunny ears.
Level up by finding shields and weapons, and they will help you bring your sole mate home from the evil Peg Leg, a bitter old wooden leg.

So, put the sole in soul and work together in this goofy world.


KEY FEATURES

data.short_description: Play together in this local co-op party where the shoes are in control! Guaranteed boots, battles, and bosses in your hunt for the evil Pegleg.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
